messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Hi there list :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Bronwen, Welcome back :) I too have recently came back and I welcome you :) Peace, Tami Namaste is an East Indian greeting which means the light within
messages.messageBody:
Hi Bronwen,

Welcome back :)

I too have recently came back and I welcome you :)

Peace,
Tami
'Namaste' is an East Indian greeting which means 'the light within me bows
to the light within you.' In other words, beyond our achy bones, our tired
feet and our multi-colored real life soap operas, lurks a dimension that is
more than the body, the persona, the ego and all the 'trappings and the
suits of woe' as Hamlet would say---a dimension where there isn't a 'you'
and 'me' but rather a synergy that is more than all that, a space for the
eternal to rest within the temporal.

----- Original Message -----
From: "Bronwen" <felesina@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, September 25, 2002 1:28 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Hi there list :-)


> Hi list!
>
> I have recently jumped on the list again, after being gone a while- Hi!!
>
> My name is Bronwen, my husband Lon and I have three children- dd 14, ds
10,
> ds 2. We are wild and crazy radical unschoolers alright :-) Our kids
have
> never been in school (dd went to three months of kindergarten)
>
> Talk to you soon! I am going to try to lurk mostly and hear all the neat
> stuff- already got two links since I have been back on !
>
> Love,
> Bronwen
>
>
>
> ~~~~ Don't forget! If you change topics, change the subject line! ~~~~
>
> If you have questions, concerns or problems with this list, please email
the moderator, Joyce Fetteroll (fetteroll@...), or the list owner,
Helen Hegener (HEM-Editor@...).

email to:

>

messages.subject: Hi there list :-)
messages.msgSnippet: Hi list! I have recently jumped on the list again, after being gone a while- Hi!! My name is Bronwen, my husband Lon and I have three children- dd 14, ds 10,
messages.messageBody:
Hi list!

I have recently jumped on the list again, after being gone a while- Hi!!

My name is Bronwen, my husband Lon and I have three children- dd 14, ds 10,
ds 2. We are wild and crazy radical unschoolers alright :-) Our kids have
never been in school (dd went to three months of kindergarten)

Talk to you soon! I am going to try to lurk mostly and hear all the neat
stuff- already got two links since I have been back on !

Love,
Bronwen
